The eight factors of the observance of t: Giving up alcoholic drinks that cause negligence
Eating in one part of the day, abstaining from eating at night and from food at the wrong time
Giving up dancing, singing, music, and seeing shows; and beautifying and adorning themselves with garlands, fragrance, and makeup
Giving up high and luxurious beds
